name: Python BattleShip
body:
#### A tribute to the old time when computer monitors only can display ASCII characters.


```

                                                   ,:
                                                 ,' |
                                                /   :
                                             '-/   /
                                             </   />
                                             /   /
                                          __/   /
                                          )'-. /
                                        ./   //
                                         /.' '
                                         '/' ,
                                         +
                                        '
                                      `.
                                  .-"-
                                 (    |
                              . .-'  '.
                             ( (.   )8:
                         .'    / (_  )
                          _. :(.   )8P  `
                      .  (  `-' (  `.   .
                       .  :  (   .a8a)
                      /_`( "a `a. )"'  '
                  (  (/  .  ' )=='') ` a `
                 (   (    )  .8"   +)) `) ` 
______       _   _   _        _____ _     _         _____  _____  __    ___
| ___ \     | | | | | |      /  ___| |   (_)       / __  \|  _  |/  |  /   |
| |_/ / __ _| |_| |_| | ___  \ `--.| |__  _ _ __   `' / /'| |/' |`| | / /| |
| ___ \/ _` | __| __| |/ _ \  `--. \ '_ \| | '_ \    / /  |  /| | | |/ /_| |
| |_/ / (_| | |_| |_| |  __/ /\__/ / | | | | |_) | ./ /___\ |_/ /_| |\___  |
\____/ \__,_|\__|\__|_|\___| \____/|_| |_|_| .__/  \_____/ \___/ \___/   |_/
                                           | |
                                           |_|             jackieqif
```

```You need to have python on your computer. Mac usually comes with Python pre-installed.```

To play:
  * download zip or gz, uncompress.
  * open terminal (maximize the terminal window for best gaming experience).
  * cd to the uncompressed directory.
  * run: python battleShip.py 

You are welcome to fork and extend the story lines!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
